name: smart-tab-switcher
description: Fast tab switching and management for modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, and Chromium-based browsers)

scripts.dev:chrome: npm run clean:chrome && webpack --mode development --watch --progress --env browser=chrome
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run clean:firefox && webpack --mode development --watch --progress --env browser=firefox
scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean:chrome && webpack --mode production --progress --env browser=chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean:firefox && webpack --mode production --progress --env browser=firefox
scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
